alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 9:22PM CDT until May 09 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Louisiana. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to a crest of 16.1 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Louisiana 15.0 14.5 14.5 15.8 16.1 15.6 15.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
